showScoreExcerpt:
"A star vehicle with more than its share of glitz and glamour masking an old-fashioned story that is mediocre at best and downright embarrassing at worst...Midler has charm and energy to spare, if not quite the pipes and the moves...This version is really more of a cabaret-circus variety show than a full-fledged Broadway musical...Through it all, though, thereâ€™s Bette, who never really inhabits the role but plays herself playing the character while basking in the unending attention."
